attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel that us the peeple that enjoy smokeing cannabis should have the free and legal right to do so. This was the hole point of world war 2, to have your human rights and ours is to have a smoke in our houses.  If cannabis was legal there would be less crime!!!!! So Prime Minister please make cannabis legal

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
